intro: 21Shares 21BTC is an institutional Bitcoin-backed token on Solana. The token maintains mint authority and metadata update capabilities under centralized control, reflecting the institutional custody model.

risk_factors: Has mint authority - tokens can be minted

authority_analyses.mint_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='111gYDSeg2Pv2YVUtVjJdBWnT5vSBd4xbP3VHRCcf3', authority_type='Non-existent', capabilities=['Address does not exist'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Invalid authority address'})
authority_analyses.update_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='21co44cadi5BCQ5bE45vR3Fjf1mkfryYnxq9G61MJhzj', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': ['Has significant SOL balance - actively maintained']})

recommendations: Consider decentralizing mint_authority - current setup is high risk
